name: Fits of Gloom
description: '''Fits of Gloom''' was an Italian music project, active in the 1990s. They had a 1994 hit with "Heaven", which reached No. 47 on the [[UK Singles Chart]] and a No. 49 hit with their version of "[[The Power of Love (Jennifer Rush song)|The Power of Love]]" featuring British singer [[Lizzy Mack]].
